title: enna parAmukham ammA sammatamA
sahitya:
enna parAmukham ammA sammatamA en gati EdammA Ezhil uruvam pAdaDamAvaDi
irundu tavam urum ammA himaiyavar tozhu shankara mOhini dEvi id- 


anupallavi

  svarNakkiLi padma karNikai mElE sokki sokki pADum varNanai mElE 
innam mayangi nI irundAl ikkAlE en pADennAghum ammA adalinAlE
punnakai mukham malarndirukkudu pOdAk-kuraikku varam taravum 
innamum abhayak-karamenum iru inamalar iLam daLamenak-kATSikku 
irukkudu......  adarkkenavum niyamittaruLiya aDiyEn gati irukkudu....... 
un dayavenakk-irukkudena uNartti enai uyarttiviDa


caraNam    kAncI nagara nidhiyE kAmAkSi un sannidhiyE kai tozhudAl uNDu gatiyE 
kaN kaNDa sAkSi mukha kaviyE Om shIkaramAvaDiyE kANum uttamiyE vEda uDivE
ulagaLanda varadarAjan atti giri Eri sangamoDu uDan pirandAn unaik-kAkka
uLamarinda shivashankaran EkAmbaran ena tAmamAghiyum uvandu maNandu
unaik-kAkka iduvarinda dEvarum munivarum isaiyoDu marai paraviDa ninadiru 
inai malaraDiyinai edir nOkka EdEdu karuNa tarAviDil ini pOdEdu vAzhvEdu
idu muzhuvuvadum innum nI purindu koLLa malippadu
